definition: old term/old way of referring to sth

sentences.english: Women in ancient times because of the head shaped like a bun, formerly known as bun mountain.
sentences.chinese: 因形如古代婦女頭上髮髻，舊稱髻山。

sentences.english: The ancient town of Xingcheng was called Ningyuan in the past. It is a well preserved ancient town built in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 興城古城舊稱寧遠衛城，是一座保存完好的明代古城。

sentences.english: The old pawn shop is located in the FuQiang Street.
sentences.chinese: 清代年間此街有當鋪，故富強街舊稱典當街。
